deepDive.title: Why Kendra Build?
deepDive.intro: Traditional AI coding tools try to do the thinking for you, often resulting in generic, average code. Kendra Build takes a different approach. We believe AI should act as an expert collaborator—challenging your assumptions, enforcing architectural standards, and guiding you through structured workflows to bring out your best engineering.

sections.title: The Breakthrough Method
sections.content: Kendra Build is grounded in the Breakthrough Method of Agile AI Driven Development. It's not just a set of prompts; it's a rigorous framework that orchestrates 21+ specialized agents to mimic a high-performing software team. From the Product Manager who defines the scope to the Architect who validates the design, every step is deliberate and documented.

sections.title: Scale-Adaptive Rigor
sections.content: One size does not fit all. A quick bug fix shouldn't require a 10-page spec, and an enterprise platform shouldn't be built on a napkin. Kendra Build's 'Scale-Adaptive Intelligence' assesses your project's complexity (Levels 0-4) and automatically adjusts the depth of planning, documentation, and testing required.

sections.title: From Brainstorm to Deployment
sections.content: We cover the complete lifecycle. Use the 'Creative Intelligence Suite' to ideate on features, move to the 'kBuild Method' for structured agile implementation, and deploy with confidence using our AIOps runtime. It's a cohesive journey from a spark of an idea to a production-ready system.
